text: Murlidhar Chandrakant Bhandare (10 December 1928 - 15 June 2024) was an Indian politician. He was a senior Indian National Congress leader from Maharashtra and a former Rajya Sabha member for three terms during 1980–1982, 1982–1988 and 1988–1994. He was appointed Governor of Odisha on 19 August 2007,"Tiwari appointed new Andhra governor", IST, TNN (The Times of India), 20 August 2007. he was sworn in on 21 August."Bhandare sworn in Governor" , The Hindu, 21 August 2007. He left office on 9 March 2013. Bhandare died on 15 June 2024, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Governors of Odisha Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Murlidhar Chandrakant Bhandare
